meanings: go on a trip for business purposes

vlive.korean: [용무룩] - 거짓말이었습니다 - 언니! [Sullen Yongsun] - That was a lie. - Come on! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MAMAMOO] 맘무 팀워크 터져버린 바람꽃 응원법🌬 (MAMAMOO's freestyle cheering guide)
vlive.english: [Sullen Yongsun] - That was a lie. - Come on!

vlive.korean: [용무룩] 휘인이 얘기 듣고 한거야~ [Sullen] I listened to Whee In and did it~ 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV3] EP7 음주가마무 벌칙 수행
vlive.english: [Sullen] I listened to Whee In and did it~

vlive.korean: 어쨌든 여러분... 네, 누나! 무슨 용무가 있으십니까? Anyways, everyone. Yes, what brought you here? 듣기 View video GOT7 : #3분갓세븐_20171013_05
vlive.english: Anyways, everyone. Yes, what brought you here?

vlive.korean: 여러분들 중요한 용무가 있을 때 가시는 곳이죠. You know the place where you go to take care of business. 듣기 View video UP10TION : 일본 데뷔 오리콘 3위! ♥허니텐 고마워요♥
vlive.english: You know the place where you go to take care of business.

vlive.korean: 화장실에서 여러 가지 다양한 것들을... 용무를 보고 씻고. I took care of a lot of business in the bathroom, like washing up. 듣기 View video BTS : 호비랑 놀자 🎂
vlive.english: I took care of a lot of business in the bathroom, like washing up.

examples.korean: He had to settle his affairs in Paris before he could return home. 발음듣기 그는 집으로 돌아가기 전에 파리에서 용무를 마쳐야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had to settle his affairs in Paris before he could return home. 발음

examples.korean: Business carried him to London. 발음듣기 사업상의 용무로 그는 런던에 갔다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Business carried him to London. 발음

examples.korean: My husband went to Busan on urgent business. 발음듣기 남편은 긴한 용무로 부산에 갔다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My husband went to Busan on urgent business. 발음

examples.korean: Please leave if you don't have any business here. 발음듣기 특별한 용무가 없으면 돌아가십시오 Neungyule
examples.english: Please leave if you don't have any business here. 발음

examples.korean: If you have urgent business, contact Park Jiyun. 발음듣기 급한 용무가 있으시면 박지윤 씨에게 연락하세요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you have urgent business, contact Park Jiyun. 발음
